title: Facile fabrication of B-rGO/ZnFe2O4 p–n heterojunction-based S-scheme exciton engineering for photocatalytic Cr(VI) reduction: kinetics, influencing parameters and detailed mechanism
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,20312-20327

The scheme represents the photocatalytic Cr (VI) reduction by 2BrZn p-n based S-scheme heterojunction photocatalyst.
